ygData.subject: Re: Well tiime to get POed pottery buffs....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... bowls? ... I witnessed the demise of pottery in the EQ General Chat channel. I dropped in there on Thursday night, and Aradune (Brad) was there.  Someone
ygData.messageBody:
>Nick Emmerich wrote:
>
> I coulda told you this was going to happen =P What's the word on mixing
bowls?
> -Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM


I witnessed the demise of pottery in the EQ General Chat channel.

I dropped in there on Thursday night, and Aradune (Brad) was there. Someone
asked
something like "What can you do in the game to make money?" and some idiot
replied
to him "I make 80p per day with pottery". A few moments later Aradune said
"80p per day???".
After that nothing more about pottery was said.

And now we have the patch, cuz some idiot couldn't keep his trap shut. The
link between
this incident and the patch is quite clear.
